data.text: @OneJerseySchorr Or, maybe, just maybe, this was total bullsh*t from the beginning.
@OneJerseySchorr Do these recommendations apply to Healthcare facilities?

@OneJerseySchorr Does it change from admitted because of covid19 / still hospitalized because of heath issues
 "caused by covid19" ?

@OneJerseySchorr With most American adults overweight or obese (73.6% in total, according to CDC’s 2017-18 data) and those counting among the CDC’s “at-risk” conditions, three quarters of Americans should be masking during “yellow.” Important to get that info out.
https://t.co/oS8FXlJxt7

The CDC looks at the combination of 3 metrics — new Covid-19 admissions per 100,000 population in the past 7 days, % of staffed inpatient beds occupied by Covid-19 patients, and total new COVID-19 cases per 100,000 population in the past 7 days — to determine the community level.
